languages.text:
"Когда-то я верила, что приведу Дом к процветанию. На деле же счастье и благодать уже много лет обходят нас стороной, будто сам Простор пытается выжить детей Орселлио из своих пределов. Если в ближайшее время ничего не изменится, мы зачахнем, как ночные цветы на рассвете, а то и вовсе падем.
***
Не иначе как само Море Душ благоволит мне! Во время последнего перелета я узрела око жестокой бури, хранящее сокровище могущественное и опасное, как и сама наша сила, среди руин ксеноского мира. И я отыскала его! Не хочу даже вспоминать, каков был путь и чего он стоил нашему Дому. Один только ритуал... неважно! Все окупится — стоит лишь приложить должные усилия.
***
Милостью Императора мы уцелели в ужасном шторме! Однако эльдарские руины произвели удручающее впечатление на команду. Эти жалкие простолюдины слишком много болтают, атмосфера в лагере накаляется... Прикажу купировать языки тем, кто узрел первые эксперименты — информация не должна просочиться на корабль. Нет. Пусть клан Сеттала купирует их каждому плебсу".

traits.locale_text:
"Когда-то я верила, что приведу Дом к процветанию. На деле же счастье и благодать уже много лет обходят нас стороной, будто сам Простор пытается выжить детей Орселлио из своих пределов. Если в ближайшее время ничего не изменится, мы зачахнем, как ночные цветы на рассвете, а то и вовсе падем.
***

И я отыскала его! Не хочу даже вспоминать, каков был путь и чего он стоил нашему Дому. Один только ритуал… неважно! Все окупится — стоит лишь приложить должные усилия.
***
Милостью Императора мы уцелели в ужасном шторме! Однако эльдарские руины произвели удручающее впечатление на команду. Эти жалкие простолюдины слишком много болтают, атмосфера в лагере накаляется... Прикажу купировать языки тем, кто узрел первые эксперименты — информация не должна просочиться на корабль. Нет. Пусть клан Сеттала купирует их каждому плебсу".

languages.text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."
languages.original_text:
"Когда-то я верила, что приведу Дом к процветанию. На деле же счастье и благодать уже много лет обходят нас стороной, будто сам Простор пытается выжить детей Орселлио из своих пределов. Если в ближайшее время ничего не изменится, мы зачахнем, как ночные цветы на рассвете, а то и вовсе падем.

И я отыскала его! Не хочу даже вспоминать, каков был путь и чего он стоил нашему Дому. Один только ритуал... неважно! Все окупится — стоит лишь приложить должные усилия.

Прикажу купировать языки тем, кто узрел первые эксперименты — информация не должна просочиться на корабль. Нет. Пусть клан Сеттала купирует их каждому плебсу".

traits.locale_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a world of the xenos, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. The tensions in the camp are rising... I should order to dock the tongues of those who bore witness to the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just theirs. I shall have the Setthala clan dock every lowborn there is."

languages.text:
「私ならわが家を繁栄に導けると信じていたときもあったが、実際は、幸運と恩恵は私たちを通り過ぎていくばかりだった。まるでコロヌス・エクスパンスそのものがオーセリオの子どもたちを境界から追い出そうとしているかのようだ。近い将来に何も変化がなければ、私たちは皆、夜明けを迎えた夜咲きの花のように衰退してしまう…あるいは、 完全に没落してしまう可能性だってある。
***
魂の海そのものが必ず 、私の願いを聞き入れるに違いない！最後のジャンプの最中、荒々しい嵐の目の中心をのぞき込んだ。嵐の中には滅びた異種族の星、その中心には宝があった。力強く危険な、私たちの力とよく似た力だ。この力にたどり着く方法を私は見つけた！それまでの旅路とオーセリオ家が払った犠牲の記憶を振り払う。儀式だけで生じた犠牲は…気にしてはならない！目的地にはそれだけの価値がある。私たちだけでも十分成し遂げられる。
***
皇帝の恩寵により、あの凶悪な嵐を抜けることに成功した！だが、アエルダリの遺構が乗務員の気力を削いでいるようだ。卑しい平民どもはおしゃべりが過ぎる。キャンプの緊張感が増していく…私は最初の実験を証言する者の口封じを命じるべきだ…この情報が船に届くことがあってはならない。いや、船の乗務員だけではない。セッタラ一族に卑しい者全員の口封じを任せよう」
languages.original_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."

traits.locale_text:
「私ならわが家を繁栄に導けると信じていたときもあったが、実際は、幸運と恩恵は私たちを通り過ぎていくばかりだった。まるでエクスパンスそのものがオーセリオの子どもたちを境界から追い出そうとしているかのようだ。近い将来に何も変化がなければ、私たちは皆、夜明けを迎えた夜咲きの花のように衰退してしまう…あるいは、 完全に没落してしまう可能性だってある。
***
魂の海そのものが必ず 、私の願いを聞き入れるに違いない！最後のジャンプの最中、荒々しい嵐の目の中心をのぞき込んだ。嵐の中には滅びた異種族の星、その中心には宝があった。力強く危険な、私たちの力とよく似た力だ。この力にたどり着く方法を私は見つけた！それまでの旅路とオーセリオ家が払った犠牲の記憶を振り払う。儀式だけで生じた犠牲は…気にしてはならない！目的地にはそれだけの価値がある。私たちだけでも十分成し遂げられる。
***
皇帝の恩寵により、あの凶悪な嵐を抜けることに成功した！だが、アエルダリの遺構が乗務員の気力を削いでいるようだ。卑しい平民どもはおしゃべりが過ぎる。キャンプの緊張感が増していく…私は最初の実験を証言する者の口封じを命じるべきだ…この情報がシップに届くことがあってはならない。いや、シップの乗務員だけではない。セッタラ一族に卑しい者全員の口封じを任せよう」

languages.text:
“曾几何时，我坚信我会带领家族走向繁荣。可实际上，好运与祝福早已抛弃了我们，正如科罗努斯扩区正打算把奥赛罗家族的子民赶出它的边境一样。如果无法很快做出改变，如果一切继续下去，我们所有人都会像黎明前的夜来香一样凋谢。或许，我们的家族最终会濒临灭亡。
***
灵魂之海似乎听到了我的话，它保佑了我！在最后的亚空间跳跃之中，我看到了恐怖的风暴眼。而在那风暴之中，在那个异形世界的废墟之中，我看到了强大而危险的宝藏，它蕴含的力量与我们的力量并无二致。我找到了抵达那片废墟的办法。我不再顾忌会遭遇什么事情，也不再顾忌我们的家族会付出多大代价。光是那场仪式本身，就让我们……但没关系！那个目标值得我们付出这样的代价，我们只需要继续努力就好了。
***
承蒙帝皇的恩典，我们禁受住了那恐怖的风暴！然而，抵达艾达灵族的废墟之后，船员们似乎一个个都失去了斗志。那些可悲的普通人说的实在是太多了，营地里的气氛也变得越来越紧张……我应该下令，把所有亲眼见证最初实验的人舌头都割掉，不能让这些消息传到飞船上。不，不仅仅是那些人，我要命令塞塔拉氏族，让他们把所有下等人都扣押起来。”
languages.original_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."

traits.locale_text:
“曾几何时，我坚信我会带领家族走向繁荣。可实际上，好运与祝福早已抛弃了我们，正如科罗努斯扩区正打算把奥塞罗家族的子民赶出它的边境一样。如果无法很快做出改变，如果一切继续下去，我们所有人都会像黎明前的夜来香一样凋谢。或许，我们的家族最终会濒临灭亡。

***
承蒙帝皇的恩典，我们禁受住了那恐怖的风暴！然而，抵达艾达灵族的废墟之后，船员们似乎一个个都失去了斗志。那些可悲的普通人说的实在是太多了，营地里的气氛也变得越来越紧张……我应该下令，把所有亲眼见证最初实验的人舌头都割掉，不能让这些消息传到飞船上。不，不仅仅是那些人，我要命令塞塔拉氏族，让他们把所有下等人都扣押起来。”

languages.text:
« Il fut un temps où je croyais pouvoir apporter la prospérité à ma maison, mais voilà bien longtemps que la fortune nous a désertés, comme si les Étendues elles-mêmes essayaient d'expulser les enfants Orsellio hors de ses frontières. Si rien ne change, et vite, nous finirons tous par flétrir comme des fleurs nocturnes à l'aube... ou pire encore, nous devrons nous résigner à la déchéance la plus totale.
***
Je dois être bénie par la Mer des Âmes elle-même ! Lors de notre dernier saut, j'ai pu voir dans l'œil d'une tempête particulièrement vicieuse. En son centre, parmi les ruines d'un monde xénos, se trouvait un trésor, aussi puissant et dangereux que notre propre pouvoir. Et j'ai trouvé un moyen de l'atteindre ! Je ne regrette plus ni ce voyage ni le prix que notre maison a dû payer. Le rituel à lui seul était... Qu'est-ce que vous voulez que ça me foute ? Notre objectif vaut bien quelques sacrifices, et nous ne reculerons devant rien pour l'atteindre.
***
Par la grâce de l'Empereur, nous avons réussi à traverser cette affreuse tempête ! Cela dit, le moral de l'équipage est au plus bas, probablement à cause des ruines aeldaris. Ces misérables manants parlent trop... La tension dans le camp est palpable. Je devrais faire couper la langue à tous ceux qui ont assisté aux premières expériences avant que l'information n'atteigne le vaisseau. Non, mieux encore. Je vais ordonner au clan Setthala de couper la langue de tous les gens du commun. »
languages.original_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***

Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."

Si rien ne change, et vite, nous finirons tous par flétrir comme des fleurs nocturnes à l'aube... ou pire encore, nous devrons nous résigner à la déchéance la plus totale.
***
Je dois être bénie par la Mer des Âmes elle-même ! Lors de notre dernier saut, j'ai pu voir dans l'œil d'une tempête particulièrement vicieuse. En son centre, parmi les ruines d'un monde xénos, se trouvait un trésor, aussi puissant et dangereux que notre propre pouvoir. Et j'ai trouvé un moyen de l'atteindre ! Je ne regrette plus ni ce voyage ni le prix que notre maison a dû payer. Le rituel à lui seul était... Mais qu'importe ! Notre objectif vaut bien ces quelques sacrifices, et nous ne reculerons devant rien pour l'atteindre.
***
Par la grâce de l'Empereur, nous avons réussi à traverser cette affreuse tempête ! Cela dit, le moral de l'équipage est au plus bas, probablement à cause des ruines aeldaris. Ces misérables manants parlent trop... La tension dans le camp est palpable. Je devrais faire couper la langue à tous ceux qui ont assisté aux premières expériences avant que l'information n'atteigne le vaisseau. Non, mieux encore. Je vais ordonner au clan Setthala de couper la langue de tous les gens du commun. »

languages.text:
«Hubo un tiempo en el que pensaba que guiaría a mi casa a la prosperidad. Lo cierto es que nunca hemos sido pródigos en fortuna ni bendiciones, como si la propia Extensión de Koronus pretendiese expulsar a los vástagos Orsellio de sus confines. Si nada cambia en un futuro inmediato, todos nos marchitaremos como flores nocturnas al amanecer; quizá nos enfrentemos a nuestro declive final.
***
¡Con una palabra de mis labios, el mar de almas ha de favorecerme! Durante el último salto divisé el ojo de una feroz tormenta. En su interior, entre las ruinas de un mundo xenos, había un tesoro formidable y peligroso, igual que nuestro propio poder. ¡Y he averiguado el modo de alcanzarlo! Lejos quedará el recuerdo de nuestro viaje y el precio que ha pagado nuestra casa. Ya solo con el ritual me... ¡pero no importa! El sacrificio merece la pena, y lo único que se nos exige es un debido esfuerzo.
***
¡Por la gracia del Emperador, hemos logrado salir de esa terrible tempestad! Sin embargo, las ruinas Aeldari parecen haber mermado el ánimo de la tripulación. Esos plebeyos quejumbrosos hablan demasiado. Aumentan las tensiones en el campamento... Debería cortarles la lengua a los que presenciaron los primeros experimentos: esa información no debe llegar a la nave. No, no solo a ellos. Haré que el clan Setthala deslengüe a todos los plebeyos».
languages.original_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."

traits.locale_text:
«Hubo un tiempo en el que pensaba que guiaría a mi casa a la prosperidad. Lo cierto es que nunca hemos sido pródigos en fortuna ni bendiciones, como si la propia Extensión pretendiese expulsar a los vástagos Orsellio de sus confines. Si nada cambia en un futuro inmediato, todos nos marchitaremos como flores nocturnas al amanecer; quizá nos enfrentemos a nuestro declive final.
***
¡Con una palabra de mis labios, el mar de almas ha de favorecerme! Durante el último salto divisé el ojo de una feroz tormenta. En su interior, entre las ruinas de un mundo xenos, había un tesoro formidable y peligroso, igual que nuestro propio poder. ¡Y he averiguado el modo de alcanzarlo! Lejos quedará el recuerdo de nuestro viaje y el precio que ha pagado nuestra casa. Ya solo con el ritual me... ¡pero no importa! El sacrificio merece la pena, y lo único que se nos exige es un debido esfuerzo.
***
¡Por la gracia del Emperador, hemos logrado salir de esa terrible tempestad! Sin embargo, las ruinas Aeldari parecen haber mermado el ánimo de la tripulación. Esos plebeyos quejumbrosos hablan demasiado. Aumentan las tensiones en el campamento... Debería ordenar que les corten la lengua a los que presenciaron los primeros experimentos: esa información no debe llegar a la nave. No, no solo las suyas. Haré que el clan Setthala deslengüe a todos los plebeyos».

languages.text:
"Früher habe ich einmal geglaubt, dass ich mein Haus zum Wohlstand führen würde. In Wahrheit machen Glück und Segen seit langem einen großen Bogen um uns, als würde die Koronus-Ausdehnung selbst versuchen, die Kinder des Hauses Orsellio aus ihren Grenzen zu vertreiben. Wenn sich in naher Zukunft nichts ändert, verwelken wir alle wie Nachtblumen in der Morgendämmerung — oder erleben wir vielleicht unseren ultimativen Fall.
***
Ich sage Euch, das Meer der Seelen muss mich lieben! Beim letzten Sprung habe ich ins Auge eines schrecklichen Sturms gesehen. Darin, zwischen den Ruinen einer Xenos-Welt, war ein Schatz zu sehen, mächtig und gefährlich, ganz ähnlich unserer eigenen Kraft. Und ich habe einen Weg gefunden, ihn zu erreichen! Ich vertreibe die Erinnerung an unsere Reise und den Preis, den unser Haus dafür bezahlen musste. Das Ritual alleine war ... Gleichgültig! Das Ziel ist den Preis wert, und von uns ist nur ein großer Einsatz nötig.
***
Bei der Gnade des Gottimperators, wir haben diesen schrecklichen Sturm überstanden! Aber die Aeldari-Ruinen scheinen die Stimmung der Crew gedrückt zu haben. Dieser jämmerliche Pöbel redet zu viel. Die Anspannung in den Lagern nimmt zu ... Ich sollte allen, die Zeugen der ersten Experimente waren, die Zungen abschneiden lassen. Diese Information darf auf keinen Fall das Schiff erreichen. Nein, nicht nur ihnen. Ich lasse den Setthala-Clan sämtlichen Niedergeborenen die Zunge abschneiden."

"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.

In Wahrheit machen Glück und Segen seit langem einen großen Bogen um uns, als würde die Ausdehnung selbst versuchen, die Kinder des Hauses Orsellio aus ihren Grenzen zu vertreiben. Wenn sich in naher Zukunft nichts ändert, verwelken wir alle wie Nachtblumen in der Morgendämmerung — oder erleben wir vielleicht unseren ultimativen Fall.
***
Ich sage Euch, das Meer der Seelen muss mich lieben! Beim letzten Sprung habe ich ins Auge eines schrecklichen Sturms gesehen. Darin, zwischen den Ruinen einer Welt der Xenos, war ein Schatz zu sehen, mächtig und gefährlich, ganz ähnlich unserer eigenen Kraft. Und ich habe einen Weg gefunden, ihn zu erreichen! Ich vertreibe die Erinnerung an unsere Reise und den Preis, den unser Haus dafür bezahlen musste. Das Ritual alleine war ... Gleichgültig! Das Ziel ist den Preis wert, und von uns ist nur ein großer Einsatz nötig.

Die Anspannung in den Lagern nimmt zu ... Ich sollte allen, die Zeugen der ersten Experimente waren, die Zungen abschneiden lassen. Diese Information darf auf keinen Fall das Schiff erreichen. Nein, nicht nur ihnen. Ich lasse den Setthala-Clan sämtlichen Niedergeborenen die Zunge abschneiden."

languages.text:
"Bir zamanlar, Hanemi refaha ulaştıracağıma inanırdım. İşin aslı şu ki talih ve lütuflar, kaç zamandır bizi es geçiyor... Gören de sanacak ki Koronus Enginliği'nin ta kendisi, Orsellio evlatlarını sınırlarından atmak için didiniyor. Gidişat değişmezse yakında her birimizin sonu, gece açıp şafak vaktinde solan çiçeklere benzeyecek... Belki de büyük bir yıkım yaşayacağız.
***
Ciddi söylüyorum, Ruhlar Denizi beni kayırıyor resmen! Son sıçramada şiddetli bir fırtınanın gözünü gördüm. Gözdeki harap bir zeno dünyasının ortasında; kendi gücümüze benzeyen, kudretli ve tehlikeli bir hazine gördüm. Hazineye ulaşmanın bir yolunu da buldum! Seyahatin anısını ve Hanemize nelere mal olduğunu aklımdan çıkarıyorum. Sırf ayin bile... Önemi yok! Hedefimiz, ödenecek bedele değecek. Elimizden geleni yapmaktan başka çaremiz yok.
***
İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki o korkunç fırtınayı atlatmayı başardık! Gelgelelim Aeldari harabeleri yüzünden mürettebatın şevki kırıldı gibi. Sefil avamın çenesi durmuyor. Kampımızda sinirler geriliyor... İlk deneylere tanık olanların dillerini kesip atsam yeridir. Bu bilgilerin gemiye ulaşmasına izin veremem. Aslında hayır, sırf onlar da değil. Setthala klanına söyleyeyim de alt tabakadan herkesin dilini kessinler."
languages.original_text:
"There was a time when I believed that I would lead my House to prosperity. In truth, fortune and blessings have long since been passing us by, as if the Koronus Expanse itself is trying to oust the Orsellio children from its bounds. If nothing changes in the near future, all of us will wither like night flowers at dawn — or perhaps, face our ultimate fall.
***
Upon my word, the Sea of Souls itself must favour me! During the last jump, I saw into the eye of a vicious storm. Within it, amid the ruins of a xenos world, was a treasure, mighty and dangerous, not unlike our own power. And I found a way to reach it! I drive away the memory of our journey and the cost that our House suffered. The ritual alone was... No matter! The goal will be worth the price, and due effort is all that is needed of us.
***
By the grace of the Emperor, we made it through that terrible tempest! However, the Aeldari ruins appear to have dampened the crew's spirits. Those pitiful commoners talk too much. Tensions in the camp are rising... I should cut out the tongues of those who witnessed the first experiments — this information cannot be allowed to reach the ship. No, not just them. I shall have the Setthala clan dock the tongue of every lowborn."

traits.locale_text:
"Bir zamanlar, Hanemi refaha ulaştıracağıma inanırdım. İşin aslı şu ki talih ve lütuflar, kaç zamandır bizi es geçiyor... Gören de sanacak ki Koronus Enginliği'nin ta kendisi Orsellio evlatlarını sınırlarından atmak için didiniyor. İşler değişmezse yakında her birimizin sonu, gece açıp şafak vaktinde solan çiçeklere benzeyecek... Ya da belki de en büyük düşüşümüzü yaşayacağız.
***
Ciddi söylüyorum, Ruhlar Denizi beni kayırıyor resmen! Son sıçramamda sert bir fırtınanın gözünün içine baktım. O gözün içindeki harap bir zeno dünyasının ortasında, bizim kendi gücümüze benzeyen kudretli ve tehlikeli bir hazine gördüm. O hazineye ulaşmanın bir yolunu da buldum! Seyahatin anısını ve Hanemize nelere mal olduğunu aklımdan çıkarıyorum. Sırf ayin bile... Önemi yok! Hedefimiz, ödediğimiz bedele değecek. Elimizden geleni yapmaktan başka çaremiz yok.
***
İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki o korkunç fırtınayı atlatmayı başardık! Gelgelelim Aeldari harabeleri yüzünden mürettebatın şevki kırılmış sanki. Sefil avamın çenesi durmuyor. Kampımızda sinirler geriliyor... İlk deneylere tanık olanların dillerini kesip çıkarsam yeridir: Bu bilgilerin gemiye ulaşmasına izin veremem. Aslında hayır, sırf onlar da değil. Setthala klanına söyleyeyim de soysuz herkesin dilini kessinler."
